channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How RedState Turned My Life Around
Kamala Harris says Trump picked JD Vance to be 'rubber stamp' for former president's 'extreme agenda'
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris said former President Trump chose Sen. JD Vance as his running mate for the 2024 presidential election to be a "rubber stamp" for his "extreme agenda."

item.title: Trump Says Taiwan Should Pay for Defense
item.description: Taiwan should pay the U.S. for its defense as it does not give the country anything, Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump told Bloomberg Businessweek, sending shares of Taiwanese chip manufacturer TSMC lower on Wednesday.

item.title: Lara Trump Describes Moment Trump Shot on Live TV While Her Kids Watched—'Nothing Prepares You for That'
Trump running mate Vance to deliver 'the most important speech' of his career at Republican convention
item.description: Sen. JD Vance of Ohio, Donald Trump's running mate, will give his address on the third night of the Republican National Convention in Milwaukee, Wisconsin

item.title: DeSantis: We Can't Afford 'Weekend At Bernie's' Presidency
item.description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis compared Joe Biden's presidency to the 1989 movie "Weekend at Bernie's," in which two employees go to comical lengths to pretend that their dead boss is alive, during his speech Tuesday night at the Republican National Convention in Milwaukee.

item.title: Biden’s Disastrous Affirmative Action Administration Has Been an Unparalleled Failure
McCarthy says Trump showing 'real leadership' to the world after assassination attempt
item.description: President Trump is showing "real leadership" after the attempt on his life, showing a contrast between himself and President Biden Kevin McCarthy says.

item.title: Haley Calls at RNC For Party to Unite Under Trump
item.description: Former South Carolina Gov. Nikki Haley put aside any animosity from her sometimes-bitter campaign against Donald Trump for the GOP presidential nomination by presenting a united front during her speech Tuesday night at the party's national convention in Milwaukee.

item.title: WATCH: Ted Cruz Gives Passionate Speech, Remembers Victims of Biden-Harris Open Border Policy
Former NY congressman lays out Dems’ years-long escalating rhetoric ahead of Trump assassination attempt
item.description: Former New York Congressman Lee Zeldin recounted a bevy of attacks former President Trump and other Republicans have faced in recent years, saying he's "tired" of the strikes.

item.title: Ted Cruz: Country Less Safe Under Biden
item.description: Republicans can fix the mess at the border created by the Biden administration when Donald Trump wins the 2024 presidential election this November, Sen. Ted Cruz, R-Texas, said Tuesday while speaking at the Republican National Convention in Milwaukee.

item.title: Dr. Ben Carson Preaches, Prophesies, and Invokes Protection Over Trump on Night 2 of the RNC
GOP, Trump continue notching wins despite unprecedented Dem weaponization of government: state election chief
item.description: Wyoming Secretary of State Chuck Gray says former President Donald Trump continue defeating attacks lobbed at him from the Democratic Party.

item.title: Rep. Jordan: Doubtful Trump Will Pursue Biden Probe
item.description: Donald Trump will likely be focused on security, not potential crimes committed by President Joe Biden and his family, should he win the White House in November, says House Judiciary Committee Chair Jim Jordan.
